params.amount: Amount of tokens to deposit and burn.
params.burnToken: Address of contract to burn deposited tokens, on local domain.
params.destinationCaller: Caller on the destination domain, as bytes32.
params.mintRecipient: Address of mint recipient on destination domain.

returns._0: The unique nonce used in unlocking the funds on the destination chain.

depositForBurnWithCaller(uint256,uint32,.notice: Burns the tokens on the source side to produce a nonce through Circles Cross Chain Transfer Protocol.

localMessageTransmitter().notice: Returns local Message Transmitter responsible for sending and receiving messages to/from remote domainsmessage transmitter for this token messenger.

messageBodyVersion().notice: Returns the version of the message body format.
